proj.abbi

Class CircularSeekBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • proj.abbi.CircularSeekBar

  • public class CircularSeekBar
extends View
    This class implements a circular SeekBar. This is an externally imported widget.

    Online source: https://github.com/devadvance/circularseekbar

      • getProgress

        public int getProgress()
        Get the progress of the CircularSeekBar.
        Returns:
        The progress of the CircularSeekBar.

      • setProgress

        public void setProgress(int progress)
        Set the progress of the CircularSeekBar. If the progress is the same, then any listener will not receive a onProgressChanged event.
        Parameters:
        progress - The progress to set the CircularSeekBar to.

        Returns:

      • setMax

        public void setMax(int max)
        Set the max of the CircularSeekBar. If the new max is less than the current progress, then the progress will be set to zero. If the progress is changed as a result, then any listener will receive a onProgressChanged event.
        Parameters:
        max - The new max for the CircularSeekBar.

      • getMax

        public int getMax()
        Get the current max of the CircularSeekBar.
        Returns:
        Synchronized integer value of the max.
